column1: Can't go wrong with a giant chocolate chip cookie!  All you need is a tall glass of cow juice and ample time for 'just one more.'
Nut lovers will crave this classic chocolate chip that gets a flavor and texture boost with pecans.
Too. Much. Chocolate.  Said
column2: NO ONE EVER!  Your favorite chocolate chips get the chocolate cookie treatment to stamp out a chocolate lover's cravings.

column1: Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip.  Need we say more?
Grammy's classic gets a little flavor boost infused with warm spices .  This one's perfect for your morning cuppa!
Who could resist this decadent chocolate cookie stuffed with ooey
Chocolate Cookie?  Check.  Peanut Butter center?  Check. So
It's someone's birthday somewhere
column2: right?!  But who even needs a birthday to celebrate?  Your tastebuds and tummy will celebrate YOU for the fun burst of sprinkles in every bite.

column1: Just what the Doctor ordered "to relieve this belly ache!"  A coconut lime cookie with a powdered sugar crinkle - that'll cure what ails for sure!
Take a box of these to your next Velvet Rope event and you'll be sure to be sent to the front of the line like a V.I.P.  Classic Red Velvet gets the cookie treatment with some sweet white chips.
Sweet and sour in all the right ways
column2: this lemony cookie gets dotted by some white chips.

column1: A classic pairing in a cookie that can't be beat: a tender strawberry cookie bursting with white chips
This cookie is reminiscent of a handheld apple pie where the white chips make it a la mode.  No spoon needed!
Sometimes mini just means Make Room For More!  This downsized brownie classic adds a little bitty drizzle for pizzazz
column2: but don't let the name fool you -- it may be mini
column3: but it packs a BIG chocolaty flavor punch!

column1: A New England regional classic
column3: warm-spiced cookie will either take you back to your local roots or introduce you to a new craving.  My Dad's favorite childhood treat will soon be yours!

column1: Is it a brownie?  Is it a doughnut?  Whatever you call it
column3: peanut butter explosion will tempt your tastebuds.  We dare you to eat just one.

column1: Real maple syrup purists
column6: this maple walnut cookie will keep New England Sugaring Season in your heart Foreva!

column1: Twice baked and paired with two distinct elements: Tangy Cranberries and Nutty Pistachios
column2: this is the perfect treat to share with your bestie.  My Mom and I enjoyed precious time spent indulging this crsipy delight together
column3: and we know you will do the same with your favorite twosome.

column1: P to the third power: A tender peanut butter cookie studded with Peanuts
column2: Pretzels and Peanut Butter Cups.  You'll think you just hit the trifecta when you savor this perfectly balanced salty sweet combo.

column1: All your campfire favorites combined into one sinfully delicious delight.  The only thing missing is the stick.
Bowls and spoons need not apply. We are 'Totally Cereal' when we say just add a glass of milk.  One bite of this gem adorned with Fruity Pebbles and white chips
column2: and you'll be instantly transported back to lazy Saturday morning cartoons and cereal.

column1: Cookies inside cookies? You bet!  This showstopper is teeming with chocolate cream cookies
column3: cookies and cream candy bars and white chips.  Nibble off each nugget or take a big 'ol chomp; You do you - we won't judge!
